016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jersey.client;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.client.providers.DnsLookupService;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jersey.client.providers.SRVConnectorProvider;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jetty.client.JettyClientSslConfiguration;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
023import jakarta.inject.Inject;
024import jakarta.inject.Named;
025import jakarta.inject.Provider;
026import org.eclipse.jetty.client.HttpClient;
027import org.glassfish.hk2.api.Factory;
028import org.glassfish.hk2.api.InstantiationService;
029import org.glassfish.hk2.api.PerLookup;
030import org.glassfish.jersey.client.ClientConfig;
031import org.glassfish.jersey.jetty.connector.JettyConnectorProvider;
032import org.glassfish.jersey.jetty.connector.JettyHttpClientSupplier;
033import org.glassfish.jersey.logging.LoggingFeature;
034import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
035
036import java.util.Iterator;
037
038@Service
039public class JerseyClientConfigFactory
040        implements Factory<ClientConfig> {
041
042    private HttpClient client;
043    private Configuration configuration;
044    private InstantiationService instantiationService;
045    private Provider<DnsLookupService> dnsLookups;
046
047    @Inject
048    public JerseyClientConfigFactory(HttpClient client, Configuration configuration, InstantiationService instantiationService,
049                                     Provider<DnsLookupService> dnsLookups) {
050        this.client = client;
051        this.configuration = configuration;
052        this.instantiationService = instantiationService;
053        this.dnsLookups = dnsLookups;
054    }
055
056    @Override
057    @PerLookup
058    public ClientConfig provide() {
059        String loggerName = "default";
060        if (instantiationService.getInstantiationData().getParentInjectee() != null) {
061            Class<?> injecteeClass = instantiationService.getInstantiationData().getParentInjectee().getInjecteeClass();
062            Named named = injecteeClass.getAnnotation(Named.class);
063            if (named != null) {
064                loggerName = "client." + named;
065            } else {
066                loggerName = injecteeClass.getName();
067            }
068        }
069
070        ClientConfig clientConfig = new ClientConfig();
071        configuration.getJson("client.properties").ifPresent(json ->
072        {
073            if (json instanceof ObjectNode on) {
074                Iterator<String> fieldNames = on.fieldNames();
075                while (fieldNames.hasNext()) {
076                    String next = fieldNames.next();
077                    clientConfig.property(next, on.get(next).textValue());
078                }
079            }
080        });
081
082        DnsLookupService dnsLookup = dnsLookups.get();
083
084        JettyConnectorProvider jettyConnectorProvider = new JettyConnectorProvider();
085        return clientConfig
086                .register(new LoggingFeature.LoggingFeatureBuilder().withLogger(java.util.logging.Logger.getLogger(loggerName)).build())
087                .register(new JettyHttpClientSupplier(client))
088                .connectorProvider(dnsLookup != null ? new SRVConnectorProvider(dnsLookup, jettyConnectorProvider) : jettyConnectorProvider);
089    }
090
091    @Override
092    public void dispose(ClientConfig instance) {
093    }
094}
